subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp
lead_paragraph: Martin Truex Jr. agreed to a contract extension with Dale Earnhardt Inc. that will keep him in the No. 1 Chevrolet at least through 2009. The sides had a mutual option on the 2009 season, but Truex had been reluctant to commit. Now the sides are working on a longer deal.
